file.name: motu.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"

info:
  title: Masters of the Universe
  version: "1.0"

paths:
  /characters:
    get:
      summary: Search characters
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                maxItems: 3
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Character'

  /characters/{characterId}:
    get:
      summary: Read a character
      parameters:
        - name: characterId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Character'
    # TODO: Add "Delete a character"

components:
  schemas:
    Character:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          pattern: ^[a-z]{3,}$
        name:
          type: string
          minLength: 3
          maxLength: 36
        birthDate:
          type: string
          format: date
        age:
          type: integer
          minimum: 0
          maximum: 128
        side:
          type: string
          enum:
            - hero
            - villain
            - neutral
        archEnemyId:
          type: string
